patthana8.51:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.51:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.51:3.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1 (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.51:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
